p.e:
At some point you also
may want to save coins
by recycling scrap.
Don't underestimate the
recycler, it can fully use
enemy remains.
Use gearmovers to bring
the corpses of fallen
enemies to the recycler
(or to a conveyor belt
connected to it) and use
the coins to make your
army.
Save up for big things!

CHAPTER 5: WINNING

The way to win is to
further advance your
front lines by "turret
creeping", where you
use wallers and builders
to build bricky turrets
closer and closer to the
enemy.
Your fuel for this tactic
will be the units you are
sending to the front.
Do not underestimate
the any-hilator!
